titleStmt.title: SII 6.434: original edition by K. V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 434. (A.R. No. 149 of 1898). ON THE SOUTH WALL OF A RUINED TEMPLE TO THE SOUTH OF TIRUVALLAM, GUDIYATTAM TALUK, NORTH ARCOT DISTRICT.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . vikkaramacoḻadevaṟku yāṇṭu Añcāvatu
jeyaṅkoṇṭacoḻamaṇṭalattup perumpāṇappā
ṭik karaivaḻik kāraiyāṉa puvaṉamuḻutuṭaiccaruppetima
ṅkalattu mahāsabhaiyom nilavilaiyāvaṇak kaiyeḻu
ttu Ikkaraivaḻi tirucciṟṟampalapurattut tiruvakattiśvaramuṭaiya
mahādevar koyilil Ātidāsaṉ caṇṭeśvaradevaṟku nāṅkaḷ
IṟaiIḻicci viṟṟukkoṭutta nilamāvatu Eṅkaḷūr vaṭapiṭākai teṭka
ṭai vaṭakkiṟ poṟpaṭṭinilattukku kiḻpāṟkellai teṉvaṭalāṉa
voḻuṅkaik kiḻācaṟutikku meṟkum Ivvoḻuṅkai vaṭakku karai yeri
kku nirpāyum Āṟṟukkālile yuṟavum Itaṟkut teṟkum Ivvoḻuṅkai teṉki
ḻakku nokkikkuiḻakkumeṟkum perumāḷkoyi leṟappoṉa peruvaḻiyile
yuṟavum Ivvoḻuṅkaikku melaivāykkāl paḻampaṭi nirpāyap
peṟuvatākavun teṉpāṟkellai perumāḷkoyi leṟappoṉa peruvaḻi
kku vaṭakkum melpāṟkellai nokāvāṟṟukkuk kiḻakkum vaṭapāṟkellai
kāraiyerikku nirpāyum Āṟṟukkālukkut teṟkum Iṉṉāṟpāṟkellai
kkum naṭuvuṭpaṭṭa nilattiṟ tāṇi viccātirikkacauñ cālāpokattukkum ma
ṭukkuḻikkun taṉ kiṭaiye paṇṭoṭi paḻanaṭainir pāyappeṟuvatākavu
m Inṉilattiṉuḷḷe tiruvallamuṭaiya mahādevar koyilil maṭappu
ṟamāka viṟṟa teṟkiṟ poṟpaṭṭikkuñ cālāpokamuḷḷiṭṭu nilattukkum kaṭa
ppukkāl paṇṭoṭu paḻanaṭainir pāyappeṟuvatākavum Innāṟpāṟkellai
kkum naṭuvupaṭṭa naṉcey ṇkolāl nila muveliyum punceyu
ḷḷatum mikutikkuṟaivuḷḷaṭaṅka viṟṟukkoṭuttukkoḷvatāṉa vemmi
licainta vilaipporuḷaṟa Āvaṇakkiḻikaiccelavāka Iṟaittiravvyamu
m kiraiyattiravvyamu maṟakkoṇṭu viṟṟu vilaiyāvaṇañ ceytukoṭu
ttom Ātidāsaṉ caṇṭeśvaradevaṟku Ippuvaṉamuḻutuṭaiccaturve
dimaṅkalattu mahāsabhaiyo mitukku Ituve poruṇmāvaṟutip poru
ṭcelavolaiyāvatākavum Ituvallatu veṟu poruṇmāvaṟutip
poruṭcelavolai kāṭṭakkaṭavaṉallātānākavum Iṉṉilattukku nirvilai
Antarāyakkāceṉṟum mavāttiram Uppukkāceṉṟum veṭṭi Amañci Ec
coṟu kūṟṟunelleṉṟum maṟṟu Epperppaṭṭiṉa kaṭavaṉallātāṉāka
vum Innilattile veṇṭiṉa payir ceytukoḷḷap peṟuvā
ṉākavum kuḻippiṉ kuḻittum Ucarttuviṉ Ucarttiyuṅ koḷḷappe
ṟuvāṉākavum Iṉnilattukku vanta Iṟaiyellām nāṅkaḷe Iṟu
kkakkaṭavomākavum Iṉnilattukkup pāyakkaṭava kacam paṇṭoṭu paḻa
naṭainir pāyappeṟuvatākavum Ōlaikkuṟṟam Eḻuttukkuṟṟañ coṟ
piḻaiyeṉṟu collappeṟātomākavum Ippaṭi kalliluñ cempi
davaṟku Ikkaraiy
ṉa puvaṉa muḻutuṭaiccaturvetimaṅkalattu mahāsabhaiyom .

app.note: Below this, there is space for two lines.

div.p: Digital edition of SII 6.434 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
